title: Crows & Other Beasts
description: What truly separates man from beast: memory, conscience, greed, or soul? Made up of two dark short stories that will stay with you, this is the perfect quick and queer literary read for Halloween. CROWS: Death has been seeking out Ellen Cumberland her entire life, but when he finally catches her, as a dementia patient in a nursing home, why are his hands so cold? THE FIGHT: A mysterious stranger finds out that anything goes in Thirsty's Bar, even battles to the death. WARNING: This book contains adult content, sexual references, and profanity and is recommended for adult readers.
author: Karin Cox
